additional_info: Perfume is a Japanese pop girl group from Hiroshima Prefecture, Japan, consisting of Ayano ÅŒmoto ("Nocchi"), Yuka Kashino ("Kashiyuka") and Ayaka Nishiwaki ("A~chan"). The group has been signed with Amuse, Inc. since 2003 and with Universal Music Group since 2012.
